content.raw:
Found another bug.  I ran a simulation with resolution 128^3, and wanted to restart at resolution 256x256x128.  Then

dset.shape[1:] = (64, 127, 128)

layout.global_shape(scales=1) = [128 255 128]

scales = (0.5, 0.49803921568627452, 1.0)

instead of (0.5, 0.5, 1.0).  Not sure how to fix this generally...
